automation_yaml:
id: 'daily_1700_office_wled_living_room_sequence'
alias: Daily 5 PM Office and Living Room WLED Sequence
description: "Daily 5:00 PM sequence that brightens the Office WLED, then Living Room, then dims Office."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '17:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 80
  - delay: '00:01:00'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 60
  - delay: '00:00:30'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 40
